author: Kristen Saloomey
title: New York governor wants better understanding of virus
description: New York, the epicentre of US coronavirus outbreak, is increasing its testing capabilities to better understand how many people have been infected and who can safely return to work.
content:
New York is in the process of ramping up its capacity to process 40,000 coronavirus tests a day and has begun randomly approaching people outside of grocery stores this week looking for 3,000 random blood samples to check for antibodies.
Governor Andrew Cuom… [+118 chars]
